title: Watch PN4
summary: For Magician artistsUse with the new Psychic Notepad 4 and Android Wear Watches
developerAddress:
SYSTEMIC PRODUCTIONS
90 rue de Paris
77200 Torcy
FRANCE
description: This application is destined to magician artists and allows to receive written texts and drawings through Bluetooth transmission from a mobile electronic tactile slate called "Psychic Notepad" from Fabrice Delaure. You will be able to display incoming images on your cell phone and your Android Wear compatible watch at the same time. This application is the perfect tool for any magician desiring to do unrehearsed Mentalism in a Close-up condition with his audience and in any type of place.
descriptionHTML:
This application is destined to magician artists and allows to receive written texts and drawings through Bluetooth transmission from a mobile electronic tactile slate called "Psychic Notepad" from Fabrice Delaure. You will be able to display incoming images on your cell phone and your Android Wear compatible watch at the same time.
This application is the perfect tool for any magician desiring to do unrehearsed Mentalism in a Close-up condition with his audience and in any type of place.
recentChanges: Permits to use the new Samsung models like J5, S6, S6+, S7 and beyond.
